main: Cafe Blush is a cozy local cafe in Jalna serving freshly-prepared shakes, sandwiches and quick bites. A favourite hangout for students and families — friendly service, simple comfort food, and great value.
location: Located near Ram Mandir / Minakshi NX — easy parking.
story: Started with a passion for good food and warm hospitality, Cafe Blush has become Jalna's favorite spot for quick bites, refreshing drinks, and memorable moments with loved ones.
